CustomField.formula: IF(TEXT(Organization_Type__c) = "DC-Distributor Customer", "DC", IF(TEXT(Organization_Type__c) = "FE-Flow End Customer", "FE", IF(TEXT(Organization_Type__c) = "OD-Flow Open Distribution", "OD", IF(TEXT(Organization_Type__c) = "ED-End Compass Program Distributor", "ED", IF(TEXT(Organization_Type__c) = "FM-Skid Manufacturer/OEM", "FM", IF(TEXT(Organization_Type__c) = "HA-Flow House Account", "HA", IF(TEXT(Organization_Type__c) = "TD-Turf Distributor", "TD", IF(TEXT(Organization_Type__c) = "IR-Flow Industrial/Commercial Rep", "IR", IF(TEXT(Organization_Type__c) = "WD-WYCO Distributor", "WD", IF(TEXT(Organization_Type__c) = "WE-WYCO End Customer/Contractor", "WE", IF(TEXT(Organization_Type__c) = "WM-WYCO OEM", "WM", IF(TEXT(Organization_Type__c) = "UC-Utility Customer", "UC", IF(TEXT(Organization_Type__c) = "UD-Utility Distributor", "UD", IF(TEXT(Organization_Type__c) = "UO-Utility Other", "UO", IF(TEXT(Organization_Type__c) = "ID-International Distributor", "ID", "UO") ) ) ) ) ) ) ) ) ) ) ) ) ))
CustomField.label: Customer Type BM Hidden
